shortDescription: Experience the breathtaking world of Avatar as never before with this Extended Collector's Edition!
longDescription: Experience the breathtaking world of Avatar as never before with this Extended Collector's Edition! Follow the filmmakersâ€™ journey in the documentary Capturing Avatar, featuring interviews with James Cameron, Jon Landau, the cast and crew. Explore three versions of the film, including over 45 minutes of never-before-seen footage, the Exclusive Alternate Opening on Earth, The Art of Avatar and more!
